main event: A citizen of Ralston, Nebraska observed a bright, round, luminous object in the sky moving from north to south at a rapid rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was reportedly 30-40 feet in diameter and emitted a bright white light., The observation lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The object moved at an extremely rapid rate of speed and appeared to accelerate as it moved southward., The observer noted there was no sound associated with the observation., The observer was certain that the object was not a conventional aircraft or known type of aerial vehicle.
